articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Hamilton, Ontario

Private meetings

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Mayor of Hamilton, Andrea Horwath.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting.

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet retreat.

Closed to media
